Package com.shearosario.tothepathandback

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClosestStationsActivity  
    ClosestStationsIntent
    Serves to prepare an intent, that'll be sent to the next activity (ClosestStationsAcitivity) when we start it.
    ClosestStationsIntent.downloadReverseGeoCode
    To download the state of the origin
    CurrentLocationHandler
    Handles obtaining and passing the current location of the user to the first intent, for the second activity.
    DatabaseContract  
    DatabaseContract.EntranceEntry
    Abstract class that will correspond to the columns in the entrance database
    DatabaseContract.StationEntry
    Abstract class that will correspond to the columns in the station database
    DatabaseHandler
    Handles all the necessary steps to create, open, update, and save the databases.
    Directions
    We use the Directions class for multiple tasks, but they all relate to the obtaining and parsing of the JSON data retrieved by an Directions API call.
    Directions.DownloadAllData
    Extends AsyncTask to try and fetch JSON data from each String URL of each station in background when executed.
    Directions.DownloadTask
    Starts fetching/downloading JSON data from single URL passed In background, it will download the JSON data provided by the URL passed through
    Directions.ParserTask
    In the background parse through the JSON data contained in a passed String
    DirectionsJSONParser
    Parses any JSON data in order to obtain information so that a map can be drawn, or to determine the nearest or quickest stations based on the user's location.
    DisplayDirectionsActivity  
    DisplayDirectionsIntent  
    Entrance
    Representation of an entrance to a station in the PATH system.
    MainActivity  
    ManualLocationHandler
    Called when the user presses the search button on their keyboard, and there is text, here we try to convert the text input from the user into geo-coordinates that we can use in the next activity to get directions.
    ManualLocationHandler.downloadGeocode
    A private class that is instantiated in geocode, and it is used to download a call to the Open Mapquest Nominatim search.
    ManualLocationText  
    ObjectSort<T>
    Used to sort an object based on their distance or time from a location.
    Station
